name: The Tunnel (BiggsGames)
description:
The Tunnel is an action horror survival game. While on a night bike ride you find yourself stuck in a hole with only one path, the tunnel. You must navigate the labyrinth and avoid the monster that lurks within. Roughly a 20 minute experience. Designed and developed by the BiggsGames team.

learn more at www.biggsgames.com

CONTROLS

W A S D to move

MOUSE to look

E to interact

F to toggle flashling
